name: Hearings and Mediations
description: The Rent Board's main job is to conduct arbitration hearings and mediations for tenant and landlord petitions about rent adjustments under the City's rent control laws. However, the Rent Board can't handle issues outside of the Rent Ordinance, like breaches of rental agreements, discrimination, or retaliation cases. For these issues, please contact the San Francisco Human Rights Commission.
